description:
Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files. 
	Aspose.Email makes it easy to work with HTML or plain text emails and their attachments. It allows developers to work against SMTP, POP, FTP and Microsoft Exchange servers. It supports mail merge and iCalendar features, customized header and body, retrieving content, header information and embedded files and much more.
releaseNotes:
Bug Fixes:
NETWORKNET-33272 - A Task in MSG format when added to PersonalStorage loses much information
NETWORKNET-33277 - Partial information lost from .eml when converted to .msg or saved to .pst
NETWORKNET-33279 - Application halts when opening .EML with Subject starting from "=?iso-8859-1?Q?"
NETWORKNET-33284 - Content Type Exception at MailMessage.Load
NETWORKNET-33285 - Apose.Email halts while reading a message from Lotus Notes Format (NSF) PST
NETWORKNET-33286 - Garbage characters are shown when attached message is converted to MHT
NETWORKNET-33307 - Application hangs while loading EML file
NETWORKNET-33280 - Appointment is saved in PST. This PST crashes when opened in Outlook
NETWORKNET-33205 - System.ArgumentException: Email address is not valid - MapiMessage.ToMapiMessageItem()
NETWORKNET-33264 - Attachments lost while converting from .eml to .msg. Specially .vcf files are corrupted
NETWORKNET-33265 - Exception raised when headers accessed in MapiMessage
NETWORKNET-33266 - Invalid Content Type error while accessing Headers collection of MapiMessage
NETWORKNET-33273 - System.ArgumentException: "Offset and length were out of bounds..." at MapiMessage.BodyHtml
NETWORKNET-33274 - System.FormatException: "An invalid character was found in the mail header." at MailAddress ctor
NETWORKNET-33276 - Meeting item's partial information lost when added to PST (created using PersonalStorage)
NETWORKNET-33290 - System.ArgumentException: The ContentID cannot contain a '<' or '>'. at MailMessage.Load
NETWORKNET-33295 - While opening a Contact, application crashes with message "Email address is not valid"
NETWORKNET-33297 - Actual email subject is "Private". Aspose.Email displays it NULL
NETWORKNET-33298 - Image in email is not retrievable after adding email to PST
NETWORKNET-33303 - ArgumentNullException:"Value can not be null" at MapiMessage.FromFile().ToMapiMessageItem()
NETWORKNET-33313 - Assertion is raised when message is extracted from inbox of the PST
NETWORKNET-33314 - NullReferenceException: "Object reference not set to.." at PersonalStorage.ExtractMessage()
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within .NET applications
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
